Vincu | junior to mid-level backend developer | Bogot√°, Colombia | ONSITE | VISA

We are an employment technology company, created to tackle the frustration within the Latin American labor market caused by the lack of signaling and peoples' trust in existing solutions.

We are looking for a passionate problem solver with a track record of interesting and challenging work to join our multinational team.

Technologies we use include: Python, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch and EmberJS.

https://polymathv.com/join-us/982014/Backend+Developer/

If you have any questions about the role, company or Colombia in general feel free to mail me in English or Spanish: victor@vincuventas.com
